projects.title: JarJar Beats
projects.description: A music playlist creator that allows the user to create a playlist and add songs to it. The user can also search for songs and add them to the playlist.

projects.title: Cover-Me-Letter
projects.description: This was a final project that will generate a specialized Cover Letter using OpenAIs ChatGPT. When the user inputs their resume and fills out the form for Job Title and Job Location, a scraper starts scrapping indeed.com for job descriptions then ChatGPT utilizes those descriptions along with the users resume to generate a specialized cover letter for them. UNFORTUNATELY THIS WEBSITE IS OUT OF ORDER, I would love for this site to be up but it currently costs too much for an unemployed individual like myself.

projects.title: PB&J
projects.description: A final project that a user can create their own sandwich and will render on the menu in which they can vote for as many times as they want.

projects.title: Voxilized Clouds
projects.description: This is a unity project that utilizes Perlin noise and dynamic scaling to generate a dynamic platform of cubes in Unity. The script is flexible, allowing users to tweak parameter in the Inspector to achieve different visual effects and styles for their game or simulation.

projects.title: Gallery of Horns
projects.description: This is a JavaScript website that allows users to filter the animals based on the number of horns and displays additional details in a modal when an animal is clicked.

projects.title: City Explorer
projects.description: This is a JavaScript website that utilizes 3 API's; location API, weather API, and movie API to display information about the city the user searches. (Note: Weather API is expired and does not display current weather.) (Note: Movie API does take some time to retrieve data, so give it a few seconds.)

experience.company: Pursuing a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science
experience.title: Eastern Washington University

experience.company: Scanned, loaded, and executed the punctual delivery of around 50 packages daily, leveraging route optimization software to meet all delivery deadlines consistently.
experience.title: OnTrac
